channel.title: Comments for page "Ichime Uzuki"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ichime Uzuki"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So, S2 Uzuki is not Senpatsu at all! Instead it's Ekisata Uzuki. The story is currently available at Ekisata Uzuki's page if you're keeping up with the events here.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Snakeman is nefarious like that! (Turns out, I'm going to go RedEye in S2 instead of WhiteEye, slight change of plot plans!)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Super Saiyans and Vampires I can understand, but are you sure you want your bastard clone-child to have Fanboy and J-Rock Band DNA? Ewww.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That is a story for S2 or S3!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Well, that certainly beats amnesia! XD

What exactly does Uzuki plan to do when he eventually finds the Yellow Flash? (assuming McMasters eventually makes him an ally, anyway)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Ichime Uzuki's going to decide that his current body isn't suited for finding the Yellow Flash, and he's going to work with Snakeman to create a WhiteEye 'son'. Ichime's then going to have his essence sealed in his Letter of Marque and give all his items to his 'son', with the plan that the seal on the letter of marque will break when his son finds the Yellow Flash.

So, S2's going to be about Senpatsu Uzuki, who will be Sandaime Annaikage.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Damn, you're a very creative writer. That backstory is incredibly cool. How are you going to explain looping?
